label: 人皇
本: Kaempfer's Japan:  Tokugawa Culture Observed . University of Hawai'i Press . 1999
著者: Kaempfer, Engelbert; ed. trans. annot. by Beatrice M. Bodart-Bailey
説明文: Japanese calendrical system counting from A.D. 660, which is believed to have been the beginning of the government of the first emperor, Jimmu [神武]
